bibl.seg: Carol Meyer, with contributions by Lisa A. Heidorn, Salima Ikram, Richard L. Jaeschke, Thomas C. Roby & Wendy Smith, Bir Umm Fawakhir 3. Excavations 1999-2001 = Oriental Institute Publications. 141.
